author: rsw33n3y
title: ALLIN Betting DAO
description: Existing betting apps are centralized and designed to exploit players.

f6_assessments.q0: Most of the betting apps thrive on addiction and considerably large commissions against the possible rewards. This app would be a great example for possible DAO implementations and the extent of benefits availed. Both BvC and P2P done through blockchain recording leave little room for any defaults or wrong doings. The inclusion of almost all types of betting (pool,sports,prediction markers) will challenge different platforms and attract betters from different categories and hence increase the reach of the app. This will establish the the app as a fore runner in the field in an environment where the platforms struggle to create trust among users and increase user-base.
f6_assessments.q1: Target for this fund basically is: "FrontEnd and BackEnd models for BvC Casino games" , "Player and Funds management" and  "Web application based on react" and "Wallet Integration". The budget seems a little high for these jobs but also depends on the quality of product delivered. Amount to be spent on marketing the website hasnt been taken in to account. Governance and profit distribution model should have been specified. The budget breakdown should The method of addressing the ways to deal with betting addiction should have been mentioned, as in restricting the number of AllIn tokens that can be used during a particular time or number of bets. The team leadership looks good enough with their vast experience in software development(as per their LinkedIn details) however LinkedIn details of other people involved should have been shared as they have already mentioned the names of the professionals who will be involved.
f6_assessments.q2: The time line for the product development could have been reduced to 8-9months, given the funds and platform chosen, but again depends on the app robustness and user-experience delivered. Another audit could have been scheduled at the stage of 9 months. The user-interaction based targets set based on timeline are apt, user engagements and active participators on a daily bases could have been a parameter form the stage of 6 months.

f6_assessments.q0: Since market size of sports betting is $210.85 Billion (source: Statista), I think this idea for creating decentralized betting dapps are marvelous. Proposer have a good intention to make it the betting more fair instead of centralized and (usually) exploit players with removing the middlemen. Proposer intends to make native betting token ALLIN for governance and ALLIN stable-coin token (pegged to fiat), since we got DJED's update will be in Q2-2022 maybe considering DJED as your stablecoin it will be great.
f6_assessments.q1: Proposer understand that it is important hiring people with relevance skills (about online betting), kudos to that! Budgets are clearly detailed down with reasonable explanation. Since the budgets are for 6 months work and their timeline is in 12 months working, I assume proposer will be requesting more fund in the next phase. Proposer should be able to arrange how to get the next funding, because the competition in Catalyst is getting tougher every round (especially in this Dapps & Integration challenge). Proposer can create a social media account, engaging and interacting with prospective users, and don't forget to make a covert marketing to Catalyst community. Goodluck and Godspeed!
f6_assessments.q2: While the early phase website already built, we (the community) can easily audit your progress. Roadmaps are already there too! I suggest write more explanation about your roadmap will be perfect, so user can understand your progress so far. Overall the key metrics is great, no need to criticize.

f6_assessments.q0:
The proposer intends to bring Cardano blockchain into the existing betting world, create a decentralized betting ecosystem that driven by the Community, help bettors gathered, earn profits and have right in the governance, dealing with cheating problem in the current centralized betting system. By hence it could attract users to Cardano by new and viable application, well address the challenge setting. For get more convinced to the community, the proposer could provide some evidences to show inherent problems of the current betting industry and enhancing the impact of the solution, such as: cheating gambling, Bet monitoring and betting analysis practices (could see this referenced link of Interpol as https://www.interpol.int/content/download/16262/file/Good-practices-in-addressing-illegal-betting_FINAL.pdf).

As a developer, I see this proposal is scalable and has inherent growth and longevity using a unique solution, bring its competitive advantage by providing many Bet Types and Game Types, 2 types of token (ALLIN token and Stable token) for many level of risk of bettors.

It's a positive point of the proposal in mentioning challenges in the cost and complexity of regulatory compliance and licensing and gave out solutions for them. I think one thing no less important is letting more players know, trust the transparency and come to the system by suitable marketing campain, for example giving free NFT/token for experience in the first stage.

In general, I found this proposal has impactful for the community and hope it would be funded.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team is seemingly capable to deliver on their solution and has verifiable relevant experience regarding the social and technical challenges of the proposal.
The team has blind spots regarding the shortcomings in legal and not identify a path to fill this gap, I suggest to recruit as a long term work in this proposal and recalculate this legal budget.

There is a detailed cost breakdown in the proposal that makes sense for the included line items with rational budget. Only one item I concern is the budget for legal because licensing and regulatory compliance will draw much more budget in relating to government.

I look forward to see more information about marketing, but it is not mentioned at how the advertising campaign would be carried out to engage the community, attract user/bettors by what kind of media and its budget also.

But anyway, I still think this proposal has a rational feasibility to success with the MVP on developing.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal laid out a clear and reasonable timeline with specific GOALS, I think it's helpful for community tracking how the proposal is progressing.

The proposal's KPIs and other measures of success are auditable and available but it need reasonable effort of the community. I suggest to build available discord channel to interact the community right now, no need to wait for funding. Additionally, in my opinion the proposer consider to improve the current website to provide regular updates for the community easily.

The proposal clearly defines what success means with this definition is clearly derived from their KPIs and there is not much things to concern.

Generally, this propsal has enough auditability for the community.

f6_assessments.q0: This would be a very exciting project that would add some serious fun to the dApp Ecosystem. Gambling is a beloved pastime that stretches across many cultures and would be welcomed in my opinion. I believe the proposal very effectively addresses the challenge and the proposal is very clear and well laid out. They will be developing legal methods, smart contracts and infrastructure for Gambling on Cardano. The Gaming would include Casino style games as well as betting on sports, which are two very popular dapps. The Proposal states the goal of having peer-to-peer betting which seems like an innovation for decentralization. This proposal meets the goals of this challenge well.
f6_assessments.q1: The plan is presented in detail and because of the actively involved team behind the project there is little doubt in my mind that this project definitely has the potential for substantial success. The idea is very catchy and could potentially add a large amount of value to the chain if implemented correctly. I like the name is catchy as well "ALL IN". The team has talented game designers and computer programmers necessary to succeed in building a platform of this nature. The team also has a diverse group of technicians that are from around the world providing diversity. The proposals goals and the experience of the team will help this project to find success.
f6_assessments.q2: The Proposal clearly lays out goals that can be measured to asses the projects progress. They clearly lay out timetables and milestones including measuring community engagement through social network activity. The project has many specific budget requests that would build specific tools, those tools could be verified to audit if the funds were used appropriately.

solution: Community driven decentralized betting ecosystem where the token holders earn profits and have a say in the governance.
experience: Global team of developers and professionals with experience in app development, DevOps, DeFi, blockchain, and the gambling industry.
